column5: new to ottawa so i have no idea where stuff is at the moment i would like to go fishing tonight but i have no bait if you know a place or even a bait machine please message me

Not sure about right down town having worms but Le Baron is west Ottawa and has them, Oziles http://www.oziles.com/  has them east end, and I'm pretty sure any Canadian tire has them.  Welcome to Ottawa!!

Backyard , Cemetery, Public Park after dark... FREE!!!!  There's a park across the street from Billings Avenue on Riverside Drive...while heading south on Bank take a left after the bridge  MILLIONS of 'em ... never bought worms while living in OT.  Link might not work.... http://maps.google.ca/maps/mpl?ie=UTF8&z=4&moduleurl=http://maps.google.ca/intl/en/help/maps/streetview/mapplet.html&mapclient=google&utm_campaign=en&utm_medium=mapshpp&utm_source=en-mapshpp-na-ca-gns-svn   RFS

Buy some 2 or preferably 3 inch power grubs and some 1/8 ounce jig heads instead.  I forget the actual name of the colour, but the brown one works best for me.  They work just as well and will last a lot longer on the hook than a worm.  You won't have to re-bait near as often.

Worms are sold at gas stations in "drop your money into the worm box slot".....  Every corner store should have worms in their fridge.  Check Fish-hawk web site forums who are located in Ottawa.  http://www.fish-hawk.net/hawktalk/  Go down to - Fish-Hawk Marketplace  Most sponsors should sell what you are looking for.  carp-starter  - good luck
